title: Gisèle Pelicot takes stand in French mass rape trial
content: She tells a court she wants women who have been raped to know that "it's not for us to have shame - it's for them".
summary: She tells a court she wants women who have been raped to know that "it's not for us to have shame - it's for them".

title: Russians accused of crimes offered choice - go to war instead of court

title: US top diplomat issues warning to Israel over Gaza aid
content: Antony Blinken has told Israel there may be consequences if more aid does not flow to civilians in northern Gaza.

title: Ohtani's '50-50' baseball sells for record £3.39m
